h2: Fast, Secure & Peer-to-Peer Large File Sharing

featureHighlights.title: Direct File Transfer
description: Share your file online directly from one device to another without involving any server by just copy paste a link or Qr code.

featureHighlights.title: No File Size Limit
description: There is no file size limit for sharing files as We don’t upload your files on any server.

featureHighlights.title: Data Security
description: Ensure 100% security and privacy for your data during online file transfers with our tool, as we don’t upload your file to a server for transfer.

featureHighlights.title: User-Friendly
description: Our file transfer web tool is easy to use, allowing you to send large files in just a few steps—without any complexity.

featureHighlights.title: Free to use
description: No charges for transferring large files between devices. You can easily share huge files without requiring sign-up or registration.

featureHighlights.title: Cross-Platform
description: Files can be shared between different operating systems and devices, such as Windows, macOS, and iOS.

howTo.heading: How can I transfer my 2GB file directly and securely from one device to anywhere?
steps: Choose your 2GB file from your device and upload it on clicking the Add button.
Once your 2GB file is uploaded, an exclusive URL link or scan code will be displayed on your screen.
Send this URL link or scan code to the other device to transfer the file securely and directly.

faqs.question: Is it possible for my data to be shared with a third party while transferring?
faqs.answer: No, it is impossible for your data to be shared with a third party while transferring because we don’t upload your large files to the server.

faqs.question: How can I receive a 2GB file even if my device doesn’t have enough storage?
faqs.answer: You can receive large files directly from anywhere by copying and pasting the link or scanning the code generated for the files using FileDropShare.

faqs.question: How can I send and receive my 2GB files (videos, music, docs, etc.) without having enough storage?
faqs.answer: You can send and receive 2GB files using peer-to-peer file-sharing technology without uploading them to a server by using our FileDropShare.
